message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to let it go for $15,000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $9,500 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value, and this is a fair price.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $13,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
